flawed_nl_solution:
The bus started with 50 people - 15 who got off at the first stop = <<50-15=35>>35 people on the bus.
At the second stop, 35 people on the bus - 8 who got off = <<35-8=72>>72 people.
Then there were 72 people + 2 who got on = <<72+2=74>>74 people on the bus.
At the third stop, 74 people on the bus - 4 who got off = <<74-4=70>>70 people on the bus.
Then there were 70 people on the bus + 3 who got on = <<70+3=73>>73 people on the bus.
#### 73

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
